text: seonjijaleul buleum-e neohuiga neo hui saie buleudeus buleuji malla hananim-eun eotteon iyuleul gusillo dae uieseo beos-eonagalyeo haneunjileul asi go gyesinila geuleomeulo geubun-ui myeong lyeong-e geoyeoghan jaleul gyeong-gyehaljini i neun geudeul wie silyeon-i ileuji ani hago geudeul wie gotongseuleoun beol-i ileuji anihadolog ham-ila
